title: Total Mechanical Energy of Two Block System

content.question: Blocks <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> are connected by a string that passes over a pulley, as shown in the figure.
